text: tannalute tanne kaikal neratte pravartticcatinre phalamayi valla vipattum avare badhiccal avar innane parayatirikkanan nam ninne ayaccat: "nannalute natha, nannalilekk oru dutane ninakk niyeagiccukutayirunnea? enkil nannal ninre kalpanakal pinparrukayum satyavisvasikalilulppetukayum ceyyumayirunnallea
